```{r Library Setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
library(janitor)
library(flexdashboard)
```
```{r Read and Clean Data, include = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
set.seed(12345)
data("instacart")
clean_names(instacart)
```
Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
```{r Violin Plot }
instacart %>%
  group_by(order_dow, order_hour_of_day) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~order_dow, y = ~order_hour_of_day,
    split = ~order_dow,
    type = 'violin',
    box = list(visible = T),
    meanline = list(visible = T)) %>% 
  layout(xaxis = list(title = "Day of the Week"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Hour of Day Order Made",zeroline = F))
```
Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
```{r Days Since Prior Order and Department}
instacart %>%
##  group_by(days_since_prior_order, department) 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, days_since_prior_order)) %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~days_since_prior_order, color = ~department, type = "box", colors = "Set2")
```

```{r}
## Bargraph of Number of Items Ordered per Department
x <- list(title = "Department")
y <- list(title = "Amount of Items Ordered")
instacart %>%
  count(department) %>% 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, n)) %>% 
  rename(amount = n) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~department, y = ~amount, color = ~department, type = "bar") %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)
```
